page.title: 17Education in Llanelli.
page.content: Llanelli has its own Area Education Office and Area Education Officer under the Dyfed County Council Education Committee.This block contains three Comprehensive Schools,one of which is a Welsh Medium Comprehensive.All the Primary Schools here are English with Welsh taught as a Second Language to comply with the County's Bilingual Policy.Only two of the Primary Schools have Nursery classes.There are five private Play Groups in the block.The Roman Catholic Church and the Church in Wales both have a Primary School in the block.The Roman Catholic School is scheduled to have a new building soon.The Church in Wales School came into being on 1st.April 1984 by the amalgamation of the Junior and Infant V.C.Schools to form the new V.A.School.This latter School is compiling this Survey.
